list.classroomTipsDis:
This page is for teachers only. 

Do NOT read the content to the Ss.

0.5 min

1. Greet the Ss and say "Hello" to the children. (Every S who attends the class can see you, but you can't see their photos.)

2. Introduce the topic and ask: what shapes do you know?

1.5 min

1. Introduce and ask the question.

2. Play the video and sing with it. More TPRs are preferred.

1.5 min

1. To ask the Ss to help find the correct wheels, say: the wheels are missing, can you find the correct ones.

2. Drag the shapes to the buss and ask the Ss if they're the right ones.

3. Circle the wheels in differen shapes and elicit the difference, ask: are they the same?

1min

1. Teach the word: /s/ /s/ circle, have the Ss repeat the word twice.

2.Encourage them to draw a circle in the air with their fingers as they say the word.

1 min

1.Ask the Ss to look at the pictures and introduce the objects. (the sun, donut, ball)

2. Click on the shining part to zoom a pic and invite the Ss to trace the shape in the air and say the word in the same time.

2 min

1. Point to the wheel and read the speech bubble. Say: Can you find other circles in this classroom?

2. Point to different objects and ask: Is this a circle?

3. Click all the circles and say the word "circle" loudly.

1.5 min

1. Play the video and instruct the Ss to say the word "circle" as the bubble appears.

1min

1.Ask the Ss to read the word ‘square’ twice. /s//s/ square

2.Check pronunciation.

2 min

1.Ask the Ss to look at the pictures and ask: can you find an object which is in the shape of a square?

2. Invite one S to choose and click on the shining part.

3. Instruct the class to trace and say the word.

1.5 min

1. Point to the robot's head and read the speech bubble.

2. Ask the Ss to find all the squares. 

3. Circle different shapes and ask: Is this a squre? 

4. click on the objects in the shape of square and say the word.

1min

1.Introduce the shape and teach the word. This is is a triangle, follow me say ‘triangle’ .

2. Pay attention to the long "i" sound.

3.Check pronunciation.

2 min

1.Ask the Ss to look at the pictures and ask: can you find an object which is in the shape of a triangle?

2. Invite one S to choose and click on the shining part.

3. Instruct the class to trace and say the word.

1 min

1. Point to the speech bubble and ask: can you find more triangles?

2. Have the Ss find and click on the triangles (kites, flags)

1min

1.Introduce the shape and teach the word. This is is a rectangle, follow me say ‘rectangle’ .

2.Check pronunciation.

2 min

1.Ask the Ss to look at the pictures and ask: can you find an object which is in the shape of a rectangle?

2. Invite one S to choose and click on the shining part.

3. Instruct the class to trace and say the word.

1 min

1. Point to the speech bubble and ask: can you find more rectangles?

2. Have the Ss click and say the shape. (gate, windows, door)

1.5min

1. Switch the cards and have the Ss say the words.

2. T may invite more than one Ss each time.

3. Reward them with diamonds.

0.5 min

1. Say the word and invite one S to find the object which is in the shape of a circle.

2. Ask the S to drag the object below the word.

3. Check and reward.

0.5 min

1. Say the word and invite one S to find the object which is in the shape of a triangle.

2. Ask the S to drag the object below the word.

3. Check and reward.

1 min

1. Point to the shape and ask: what shape is it?

2. Read the sentence and ask the Ss to repeat after you.

3. Change speed and have the Ss repeat after you.

1 min

1. Point to the shape and ask: what shape is it?

2. Read the sentence and ask the Ss to repeat after you.

3. Change speed and have the Ss repeat after you.

1 min

1. Point to the shape and ask: what shape is it?

2. Read the sentence and ask the Ss to repeat after you.

3. Change speed and have the Ss repeat after you.

1 min

1. Point to the shape and ask: what shape is it?

2. Read the sentence and ask the Ss to repeat after you.

3. Change speed and have the Ss repeat after you.

1 min

1. Point to the pic in the center and read the sentence.

2. Invite the Ss to guess which pic in the below is the same as it. (A)

3. You may click card B first to have a try.

1 min

1. Point to the pic in the center and read the sentence.

2. Invite the Ss to guess which pic in the below is the same as it. (B)

2 min

1. Tell the Ss that you are going to build a car with the shapes in the box.

2. Drag a pic and ask: what shape is it? Answer by yourself.

3. Drag the shape into the correct area.

1.5 min

1. Tell the Ss that you are going to complet the smiling face with the shapes in the box.

2. Drag a pic and ask: what shape is it? Answer by yourself.

3. Ask: where should it go? Drag the shape into the correct area.

1min

1.Review and assess.
Nicely say goodbye to Ss.
